segments.text: Will you be done doing my hair soon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me a little while longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much time do you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There you go . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I honestly think it looks great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'm glad that I did a good job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is it for my hair ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for doing such a good job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , girl friend . I'll see you next time .
segments.speaker: S2
